subject: Re: Invite for Launch Event
preview: Hi Catherine, Ok sure, please see attached.

full_threads.body:
Hi Catherine, 

Ok sure, please see attached.

Hi Heath,



The invitation looks great!!



We will be sending out the invitations today. Can we please have it in a png and pdf file?



Thank you so much,

Catherine












Catherine Duong

Kiss Goodbye to MS Campaign Assistant

MS Research Australia

02 8413 7918 • 1300 356 467

cduong@msra.org.au • http://www.msra.org.au/

Hi Catherine, 

Ok sure, please see attached.

Hi Heath,


Thanks for sending the draft over!


Some small changes:


- Could we please have 'You are invited' positioned like the 'save the date'? Then we can lower the white box a little so it shows more of the top image.

- Let's remove the red box and just have the RSVP in black font at the bottom right corner

- Have 'Kiss Goodbye to MS Launch Breakfast' in the Kiss font

- Are you able to have the image of Bonnie in a polaroid frame?

- Can we keep the bottom image the same as the save the date? I know it looks slightly different as the image has moved a bit.

Let me know if you have any questions!


THANK YOU SO MUCH HEATH!!


Have a great weekend J


Warmest regards,

Catherine











Catherine Duong

Kiss Goodbye to MS Campaign Assistant

MS Research Australia

Hi Catherine, 

Ok the draft is ready, please see attached. 

I tried to stick to your notes as much as possible, but have made some slight tweaks to help the design work. 

Let me know what you think?

Hi Heath,



Just wanted to add to the invite.



Can you please add to the start of the details:

MC Bonnie G

Oz Beauty Expert



I have also attached a photo of her. If you can somehow add the image to the invite, that would be great! Maybe have a photo into a little polaroid frame?



Let me know if you have any questions! Thanks a million!



Warmest regards,

Catherine

Hi Catherine, 

Ok sure, are these going to be printed or sent our via email? If being printed, what size do you want?

Hi Heath,

Hope you had a lovely weekend!

We would like to start sending out the official invitations soon.

We really like the Save The Date but just want to change it a little bit for the invite. Please see request below:

- Use the same Save The Date

- Change 'Save the date' to 'You are invited'

- Move white box to landscape, with most of the box overlaying the food image, to include the below details. (so shift the white box a little lower to show a bit more of the top image)

- Please make the headings in the KGTMS font

- In the white box, please keep the blurb from the Save The Date and have the event details.


Event details below:

Date: Tuesday 2nd April

Time: 9:30am for a 10am start, event concludes by 11.30am

Dress: A touch of red

Location: The stunning harbourside family home Villa Carrara, 18-20 Carrara Road, Vaucluse

Parking: We recommend catching an Uber/Taxi to the venue

Please RSVP to Cat on: cdoung@msra.org.au by Friday 22nd March

Please let me know if you need more clarification or have any questions.

Thank you for all your help!

Warmest regards,
Catherine

Catherine Duong

Kiss Goodbye to MS Campaign Assistant
MS Research Australia
